title: Failed to deploy contract when create L2 Rollup

labels.name: S-unconfirmed
labels.description: Status: Issue might be valid, but it’s not yet confirmed

body:
<!--
Need help?
Refer to our contributing guidelines for additional information about making a good issue:
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Describe the bug**

```
forge script scripts/Deploy.s.sol:Deploy --private-key $GS_ADMIN_PRIVATE_KEY --broadcast --rpc-url $L1_RPC_URL
```
